name: ablaze with the people you've been
name_original: ablaze with the people you've been
description:
"EMERGENCY ALERT

VAULT LOCKED

SANDS SHIFTED

PULSAR FLICKERED"

Edric Tosser and His Pasts: A Story in Four Acts.

ablaze with the people you've been is an interactive blaseball story about loss, regret, and what it means to try. because of that, it centres largely around grief. a full list of content warnings can be found linked on the first page. it contains 4 acts totalling 35k words, with the first 3 sitting at around 8k each and the last 10k, and should work on both desktop and mobile.

art by olive (@sapphriarocks)
